about_the_game:
Get ready to "Drop It" like it's hot in this 3D casual arcade game! 🍓🍍
Drop into an experience where the goal is to drop and stack a variety of delicious fruits to create a mouthwatering fruit platter. Combine your way from bite-sized cherries to giant watermelons. 🍉

Combine Fruits

🍓🍓 Combine two of the same fruit to create an even bigger fruit!
Watch the magic happen as you drop on top, stack them close, or skillfully nudge the fruit around. All they need to do is touch! ✨🥥

Swap It!

🍊🥥Swap between two fruits, to help you make a more optimal choice!🥥🍊

High Score

🌟 Score big by strategically dropping the perfect combination and watch your points skyrocket!🚀
Can you out-drop the competition and score high on the leaderboards? Get on top of the daily, weekly or even the all-time leaderboards! Switch between global or just friends. Or maybe see if you can beat just your own scores.🏆

Achievements

🍒Complete a slew of difficult achievements. 🍋🍐

Controlls

🖱️ Point and drop with precision using your mouse, move with your keyboard. We recommend playing it with a controller, but any combination works! The choice is simply yours. 🎮

short_description: 2048 meets 3D, and fruits! A casual arcade puzzler about combining fruits strategically for higher scores, but beware of the limited space. How many fruits can you fit before it spills out over the edge? Retry for a fresh shot at the High Score! Claim your spot on the leaderboard!
